plot outline: Seemathurai is a village love story. Marudhu (Geethan) is in love with Poorni (Varsha Bollamma), a college student, and stalks her until she accepts his love. Trouble comes when Poorni's family is dead against their love, considering Marudhu a wastrel.
title: Seemathurai
plot: _Seemathurai_ (qv) is a village love story. Marudhu (Geethan) is in love with Poorni (Varsha Bollamma), a college student, and stalks her until she accepts his love. Trouble comes when Poorni's family is dead against their love, considering Marudhu a wastrel.
